overview: 2 fathers, 3 babys The documentary series follows the gay parents Johnny and Stefan over the course of four years in their new phase of life. After a complicated journey, their wish has finally come true: they have become fathers. After receiving an egg donation, they gave birth to the twins Amalia and Aurelio, their own biological children, with the help of American surrogate mother Robin. Three years later, also with Robin, daughter Allegra was born. Now the couple lives a diversified life...
title: 2 Fathers, 3 Babys
